channel.title: Comments on: The future of education?

item.title: By: Caleb
item.dc:creator: Caleb
item.description: My wife and I homeschool our children and Khan Academy is the absolute best resource we could find. After spending thousands of dollars on work books, books, etc; turns out all we needed was Khan Academy. That's where they learned Algebra I & II, Geometry, and several other courses. FOR FREE! They still had to take the state mandated education test and both my children scored in the 95% percentile versus public school children. And now I find out John Resig has joined Sal. What a great day this turned out to be. Thanks John, I know you will work hard with Sal.
item.content:encoded: My wife and I homeschool our children and Khan Academy is the absolute best resource we could find. After spending thousands of dollars on work books, books, etc; turns out all we needed was Khan Academy. That's where they learned Algebra I & II, Geometry, and several other courses. FOR FREE! They still had to take the state mandated education test and both my children scored in the 95% percentile versus public school children. And now I find out John Resig has joined Sal. What a great day this turned out to be. Thanks John, I know you will work hard with Sal.

item.title: By: Kiril
item.dc:creator: Kiril
item.description: After this video i feel there is a future for human kind :)
